question: Directors and managers of organizations are often older people. Some people say that it is better for younger people to be leaders. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
text: It is a common situation in  companies most vital positions like CEO and managers has been taken by the siner people, some people argue that if this situation could  change to the young genneration being incharge, it will lead the company to have better grow. This  essay is totally agrees to the satment and going to explan why.

There are several factors to support my point of view. First of all, I believe young genneration has bigger ambition and vision on they are career, it has benefical for the company future, beause they are young and has lest afraid than the older prople. They will  insit to they gold and nothing can stop them to achieve their aim and vision. If they had given the important position in the company, they would help the company in onther leave with their big ambition and vision.

Second, conversted to the older genneration the young people have more abilities to lead the organization better, because most of the young people they had the up-to-date knowledge they tranied by the new education system. Therefore, they can addapt and address to the isseus that comes up in  nowadays. For instance, they can use the internet to promote the organization thus increase the value of the organization., which the older genneration would not be able to do this.

Moreover, compared to the siner people the young people have more energy which mean they are able to  work longer and much efficence  than the siner people. And also, as they are more dynamic thus makes the business working atmosphere greater than the older people leading if they were given the leder or manager job.

To sum up, dute to the young genneration has bigger ambition, up-to-date education and better energy to lead the company torward to the better future, I believe that the young people is the best suit the vital position such as leader and manager even the CEO.
